item.description:
It's that time of the year..the Large and Medium Breed Holiday meet up!

Bring your pups as we celebrate the Holidays! Make sure to bring in your updated vaccinations (rabies, dhlpp, bordatella) and come join us for an exciting afternoon!

Also we are doing our annual Yankee Swap so please bring a present if you'd like to participate!

...And when you walk in our lobby you will see our Angel tree with lots of pets in need for the holidays...feel free to bring any donations or shop around our retail room for any presents as well.


hope to see you there!

Best Friends
item.name: Holiday Yankee Swap!
